name: speediest GBTK game
description:
my GBTK3 video was processing for way too long so I made this game while I waited, so it took about half an hour to make. 

Watch the now-processed video here:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bIblNzF7RPY

Game Maker Studio 2 source code is included if you want to fix my game.
